ComicInfo.Series: Sir Edward Grey, Witchfinder: In the Service of Angels
ComicInfo.Summary: In the Service of Angels [Chapter 5]: Gilfryd summons the creature so that it can be reunited with its bones and then dispatched. Sir Edward's newfound allies are murdered; he suspects The Heliopic Brotherhood of Ra, whom we are told he never stopped pursuing despite a warning from Mary's ghost.
ComicInfo.Tags: Mary Wolf,Memnan Saa,Gustav Strobl,Heliopic Brotherhood of Ra,August Swain,Edward Grey
